19  AR2Parcor::AR2Parcor() {

22  AR2Parcor::~AR2Parcor() {

24 
25  void AR2Parcor::execute(Dvector& AR, Dvector& Parcor) {
26 
27  Dvector tmpP(AR.size());
28  Parcor.resize(AR.size());
29  unsigned int P = AR.size() - 1;
30  Dvector sigma(AR.size());
31  sigma(P) = AR(0) * AR(0);
32 
33  for (unsigned int k = P; k >= 1; k--) {
34  Parcor(k) = AR(k);
35  for (unsigned int j = 1; j < k; j++)
36  AR(j) = (tmpP(j) - Parcor(k) * tmpP(k - j)) / (1.0 - Parcor(k) * Parcor(k));
37 
38  for (unsigned int j = 1; j <= k; j++)
39  tmpP(j) = AR(j);
40  }
41 
42  for (unsigned int j = P; j > 0; j--)
43  sigma(j - 1) = sigma(j) / (1.0 - Parcor(j) * Parcor(j));
44 
45  Parcor(0) = sigma(0);
46 
47  for (unsigned int j = 1; j < AR.size(); j++)
48  Parcor(j) *= -1.0;
49  ;
50  }
51 }

Estimate the parcor parameters by the AR ones.
